segments.text: Hey there , how are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am great . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I got laid off , and I ’ m looking for work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , me too ! What are you thinking you would like to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right now , I ’ ll take about anything that will pay the mortgage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you gone out on any interviews so far ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went out on one interview , but I haven ’ t heard back from them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you see the posting for the electrician apprentice program ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , I saw that and it looks pretty good !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s go check it out again !
segments.speaker: S2
